payload.name: fair-scheduling-weighted-queuing
payload.title: Fair scheduling + weighted queuing: prevent starvation
payload.formal: allocate service according to weights; avoid head-of-line blocking.
payload.apm2_mapping: APM2 should weight by **risk tier**, **SLO**, and **tenant**. “One noisy agent” must not starve governance-critical loops (leases, capability revocation, ledger append). Encode fairness in schedulers and in HEF drop policy priorities.
